meanings.definition: The quality or state of being capable.
meanings.sent1: Her capableness in solving puzzles impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: His capableness in fixing cars made him the go-to person in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: Despite his capableness in cooking, he managed to burn toast every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her capableness in leadership shone brightly during the team project.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's capableness to fly saved the day once again.

meanings.definition: The ability or power to do something.
meanings.sent1: The team's capableness to adapt to new challenges was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: His capableness to lift heavy weights amazed everyone at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The robot's capableness to dance was unexpected but entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her capableness to persuade others was unmatched in the office.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's capableness to run faster than the wind was truly impressive.
